lyrics.text:
Na’e tāupe ‘a e ‘Eiki
‘I he ‘akau kovi,
Pea na’e pekia ai
‘I he’etau hia.

Pea ke mou fakaongo
Ki he’ene to’e,
Lolotonga ‘ene tautau
‘I he ‘akau kovi.

Na’e fakapo’uli ai
‘A e la’ā foki,
Hoko mo e mofuike
Fakamanavahē.

Pea mafahifahi ai
‘A e ngaahi maka,
Pea matangaki hake
‘A e tanu’anga.

Pea mo e puipui
‘I he temipale
Na’e mahae ua ia
Pea ava leva.

Pea na’e tangi ia
‘I he le’o lahi,
“Kuo ‘osi, ke ke ma’u
Hoku laumālie.”
